revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox battle item |name = Magnet |image = [[File:Magnet.png|100px]] |caption = In game image of the ''Magnet'' |location = [[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Magnet''' is a type of [[Held Items|Held Item]] that can only be equipped to [[File:Electric_Type_icon.png|30px]]Electric type Pokémon. ==Details== Raises the attack of the Pokémon holding the Item by 10%. ==Acquistion== {{Loot/head‎|Battle items}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Legendary|N/A..."
